title: #087 - Slow Business Growth & What To Do About It
itunes:title: #087 - Slow Business Growth & What To Do About It
description:
If you want to learn exactly what to do to help your stagnant business grow, today is the episode for you. In this episode, I unpack why your business growth is so slow, and the things you can do to make it grow. You’ll learn:

  • Business activities that you’re constantly doing that really just hold you back
  • How to come up with profit generating action steps
  • How to build confidence to help you sell better
  • How to get out of a negative mindset
  • and more!
